Package com.pokego.datamodel

Class GameAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokego.datamodel.GameSpriteGroup
      • com.pokego.datamodel.GameAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovable
    public class GameAnimation
extends GameSpriteGroup
    GameAnimation is a wrapper object used to render animations. Each animation consists of a TextureRegion (the image file that you wish to render), the frameCount (number of frames in the animation), and cycleTime (how long each frame is displayed in seconds). Animations are found in the "./assets/animations" folder.

                     int frameCount,
                     float cycleTime)
        Constructs the GameAnimation object with a (x, y) position.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position to display animation.
        y - The y position to display animation.
        region - The TextureRegion to animate.
        frameCount - The number of frames in the animation.
        cycleTime - How long each frame is displayed in seconds.
